channel.title: Sessions on UQ AIS XNAT
channel.description: Recent content in Sessions on UQ AIS XNAT

item.title: Scans
item.description: The Scans themselves are listed at the bottom with the relevant series descriptions and other information If you hover over one of them, and click the highlighted view details button. This will open up a more details and an image preview window Here we can also view View DICOM headers And see the DICOM headers as shown on the right
